itunes:title: Episode 970 - Special Guest Congressional Candidate Eric Hohman
title: Episode 970 - Special Guest Congressional Candidate Eric Hohman
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle:
Republican Candidate for Texas' 28th Congressional District Eric Hohman joins the show to talk about why he decided to get into politics after leaving the military, his time serving as an Air Force Combat Controller, and what he plans to do if he wins.

itunes:summary:
Republican Candidate for Texas' 28th Congressional District Eric Hohman joins the show to talk about why he decided to get into politics after leaving the military, his time serving as an Air Force Combat Controller, and what he plans to do if he wins.
